website_summaries.verdict: A classic cold wax that isn't messy and gets the job done.
pros: Customers love the small strips that are contoured for the curves of your face where hair typically grows
Minimal mess as these strips don't require heat
cons: Ideal for coarse or dark hair, but doesn't remove peach fuzz well

customer_reviews.title: I have used these for years!!! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I am SHOCKED that these aren’t rated higher! I have to think it is user error. I have used these for years and love them. Waxing without mess! No goo all over, no hot wax, and they remove the hair for sure. MAKE SURE TO WARM THEM UP IN YOUR HANDS before separating, place on hair, rub in the direction of the hair with a little friction to keep it warm, and pull fast. Works every time.
customer_reviews.author: Zappa

customer_reviews.title: Made marks on skin, but didn't take off hair
customer_reviews.text: The reviews for this product is confusing. There were great reviews but I tried it and it didn't work. It left marks on my chin, but the black hairs didn't come out with the wax strip. I flowed the directions rubbing it between my hands first, but it still didn't work. Very disappointed and I have 2 burn looking marks under my chin.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nads Facial Hair removal strips bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Photo taken 13 hours after using Nads. I used Nads facial hair removal wax for sensitive skin. I used it to remove hair on my upper lip. It wasn't even on my skin for five seconds, I used all of the proper soothing techniques (ice, oil to remove the wax), and fourteen hours later I still have a bright red mark across my lip. I will never try this product again. I thought that an all natural product would be easier on my skin, but nope.
customer_reviews.author: Stevietig

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Good for facial waxing might be nice if it came w/ disinfectant pads as I usually have small white pustules pop up (probably slightly infected hair follicles) after use. I have pads of my own in my first aid kit I will be using from now on; hopefully this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I never using anything else to remove unwanted facial hair again this is a must have
customer_reviews.text: These little strips are perfect. You can cut them to size they're easy to use and it works! No pre mixing no preheating no mess just prep apply and pull that simple love it
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other wax strips I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all, the only thing that I would change about the package is the amount of the oil wipes! I use only one strip at a time so one box lasts for quite a while. These are even better than Veet strips!
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: I'm bleeding...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work, tried 2 or 3 times to use it. Would put it on a patch of 10 to 15 hairs and get only 1 out and a bunch of red marks on my face. I'm 100% bleeding. Used exactly as the instructions said. I don't mind the pain, but even after using the soothing pads, of which they send only 4 for 20 strips??? My skin is still red, annoyed, stinging and I waxed ~1 or 2 hairs per side. Used on my chin and brow, both only getting 1-2 hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Took my skin off
customer_reviews.text: I used the product like it said, it took my hair off but also a couple layers of skin! I have a couple layers of skin off of my chin and upper lip. I felt like I was going to faint when I saw it. Now my skin is just raw and I’m laying down, trying to sleep with bacitracin all over my face bc I don’t know what else to do to heal the damage. I’m really sad. I can’t get out to do any grooming like getting a wax or my nails and was really excited about this product. Not I’m just depressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off my skin
customer_reviews.text: Ripped huge patches of skin off of my face that was months ago and the scaring is just now gone. I've used other strips and had similar issues so I thought the sensitive skin stuff was what I needed. Yeah, well this was worse it ripped huge patches of skin off of my face way worse than just a regular wax strip.
customer_reviews.author: NotLandyn

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS! Will harm skin!
customer_reviews.text: FOR THE LOVE OF GOD DO NOT BUY THESE!! Followed directions & hoping I’m not scarred for life.
customer_reviews.author: Twaddle45

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for shaping my eyebrows. I don’t have time to always go to the salon so I often use these strips. So easy to use and they definitely work in place of painful plucking my eyebrows one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Betty T

customer_reviews.title: Break out or irritation
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a waxing product before or had my face waxed ever, so I'm not sure how much of this is the product or me. I know the skin on my face is extra sensitive, always has been, and I wound with a lot of bumps on my face after using the product. It worked pretty well to remove the hair where I placed it, but I think the soothing wipes were just too oily for my face and it caused the bumps. Next time I have to wax, I won't use the wipes and see if it makes a difference. If you have sensitive skin though, be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product to anyone tired of being burned by wax at the nail salon.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t underestimate these strips. They work well and worth the price. The picture I posted looks dirty but it’s make up. I could wait to see if the strips actually worked. The pic with the short hairs is my upper lip and the other pic is both eyebrows, on above the brow not under the brow. It is painful, not to the extreme but it might make your eyes water.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi

customer_reviews.title: A mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: Things I liked: the strips were very easy to use and there was no mess, the wipes for after really cleaned up the wax residue and left my skin soft. But, I have to say that I was disappointed by the performance of the wax strips. I used them on my chin and neck. They easily removed the soft hairs on my face, but did not remove the thicker, tougher hairs. So, depending on what you want them for, they may be good, but I wouldn't count on them for thick facial hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E. Cooney

customer_reviews.title: WILL RIP YOUR SKIN OFF!
customer_reviews.text: I followed all of the instructions step by step. I pulled the strip off and my skin went along with it. I’ve used nair wax strips many times before with no issues. They were out of stock so I decided to try these. I definitely DO NOT recommended these strips!!! I’m afraid that I will have a scar now and I’m very upset about the outcome. I wish I could give 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney C.

customer_reviews.title: Good on the upper lip & eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use on a family member’s peach fuzz upper lip (the strip looked like we pulled off a small eyebrow). Was absolutely shocked at what they ripped off. She said it was very painful and her lip did turn red afterwards, but it wasn’t on me so I didn’t mind. The redness was gone within 10-15 minutes. She just used a cold rag to help with the redness/pain. We then moved on to her eyebrows. We cut them in small pieces (the strips, not the eyebrows). Glad to say she started with 1 furry line across her forehead and left with 2 nicely shaped brows. She said the brows weren’t as painful. I would probably buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: ABM2017

customer_reviews.title: Thought I'd give it another try, ended up disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I used Nads way back in the day when the product first came out. It worked for a while and I don't know if they changed their product formula or what but the more I used it over time, the less results I had. At any rate, I saw these and decided to give Nads another shot. Nope...just doesn't remove the hair well and yes, I used the product correctly. It skipped right over most of my hair as if I had just used scotch tape.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These worked out well for me, I used them on my upper lip hair. I followed the instructions and the results were pretty good. I still had to tweeze a few hairs that were missed, but overall I’m super happy with these strips. I do wish there were more of the wipes for using after the wax, but other than that, this is a great product for the price! *Note: I made sure to do these at night because with any kind of waxing, it usually leaves my skin red and irritated, and by the next morning, all the redness was completely gone!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent at home solution
customer_reviews.text: Being at home in a pandemic we are faced with new challenges that we have to solution for without professionals. Waxing is something I have always left to the professionals as I was worried I did not have the proper skills. These have changed that entire thought process. They are easy to use, work just like the salon and the little after skin pads help to reduce redness. They are so easy to use even my teenage was able to do it her self. I highly recommend these at home wax strips. I liked them so much I put them on autoship and see myself using them even after we can leave our homes again. What a great little find!
customer_reviews.author: RLGordon202

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use. Didn’t irritate skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using at-home wax strips rather than going to a salon, and I must say that I was surprised by the ease of use. I warmed up the strip in my hand by rubbing it and creating as much friction as I could tolerate, pressed it against cleaned skin, and pulled against the direction the hair was growing it. I’ve used it for small areas like my eyebrows and upper lip and it has worked great. My skin can be sensitive sometimes so I didn’t bother to use the wipe that it came with it but my skin didn’t seem bothered by the wax strip at all. I’m very pleased with the overall experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sinbin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do the job and left my skin irritated
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, I'll give them that. I used these and still had a bunch of hair in the spots where I used the product. It irritated the areas where it was used and it stayed irritated and was sensitive to the touch for hours. Didn't do the job and left my skin irritated. No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: yaz

customer_reviews.title: No bueno
customer_reviews.text: Not for sensitive skin. This product actually took my skin OFF. Like other reviewers, my upper lip is bright red and raw. Part of my actual top lip is raw. I’m sure it’s going to scab. Not cool. This is a result of trying too hard to get the hair to come off. If you’re gentle you don’t get any hair. Will not be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: ashleyb

customer_reviews.title: removed the hairs but skin too sensitive and had a reaction
customer_reviews.text: These probably will work great for someone that doesn't have sensitive skin. But they aren't for everybody. The ease of these pre waxed strips was great. Easy to apply and removed 98% of the hair. It was easy enough to pluck the few hairs it missed. What I wasn't expecting was the reaction my skin would have. I can't risk having a rashy looking upper lip for 4-5 days. I will return to using the little pot of wax I melt in the microwave (never had this issues before).
customer_reviews.author: Demi

customer_reviews.title: no good for the face
customer_reviews.text: my face broke out so bad after using this product on my face.A few days after use my face was covered in bumps every where its not for sensitive skin im light skinned so my face looked like i had shaving bumps but i never shaved my face I just used the wax strips.and the strips dont get the hair out all at one time I had to use a lot of strip in the same shot because the strips just was not doing the job correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Twin

customer_reviews.title: Not for fine facial hair and/or sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I usually get my lip and chin waxed at a salon, but during Covid my salon closed so I needed a home product. I originally used Sally Hansen hard wax that needed to be heated, but ordered this product to try to avoid heating up wax. It worked awful for me! I have mostly fine, blonde hairs on my face and it hardly picked up any of them. It also left my skin completely red and sore! It’s basically like ripping tape off your face that isn’t effective at waxing. 🙁 I’ll go back to heating up hard wax! Gets almost everything and doesn’t leave my skin red.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but i don't think this is for sensitive skin - waxing at one spot more than two times leaves black burnt and hair still remains there, the mark on that particular place goes with time. For me it took 7 days to get vanished that mark.I really got worried as i used it for upper lips and mark left on my face!!
customer_reviews.author: Richa Puri

customer_reviews.title: These work amazingly well!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! It actually works very well. I bought waxing kits and other things like that in the past from the store and those never seemed to work but these on the other hand are very easy and quick to use. I normally just go to the salon and have the professionals wax my eyebrows and upper lip for me which generally ends up costing me about $30.... But now that I have these strips, I no longer have to do that! I can wax my own dang lip and eyebrows at home and save money! I am very happy with my purchase and will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are my go-to.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! As directed, they work, but they’re best when you use a blow dryer to warm them instead of hand friction. I tried the Flamingo ones that are now sold in Target (~$10) a few weeks ago when I didn’t have time to order a new package of these and in comparison these win, no competition. Sensitive skin? DO NOT wax over one area twice in one day. You will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Ameera Primm

customer_reviews.title: Does not work and irritates skin
customer_reviews.text: I really had high hopes for this in light of a lot of the reviews. I have very thin sparse hair and even that this product would not remove. It made my lip red and irritates for the remainder of the day. I would put up with the irritation if it works, but it did not. It also had a weird chemical smell, much worse than the other brands I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Can’t do it anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I used to enjoy these and sometimes it would leave scabs on my skin. This last time I used it I have scabs on my brows and other areas of my face. I followed the directions and I’ve used these before. I don’t know if they changed the formula but now when I use them my face gets scabs from all the parts it ripped my skin off, also isn’t that great at pulling the hair. It is able to remove some peach fuzz, but at the expense of also removing some skin. I still have to go through and pluck a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Best out there
customer_reviews.text: Before you knock it, make sure you are using it properly.. wash your face with plain soap or something without moisturizers in there, you need something to remove the oils from your skin, make sure your skin is completely dry. Then rub down and pull in the opposite direction of hair growth. These do the job but are also gentle on your skin, I have had other brands while work great, rip my skin which wasnt worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: didn't really remove hair
customer_reviews.text: i saw a video of someone doing a quarantine glowup using these waxstrips for their eyebrows and thought i should give it a go because i have facial peach fuzz that grows pretty fast, and i shave my eyebrows off because my natural shape sucks for makeup looks, but doing it every single day is incredibly annoying. unfortunately, these did nothing :( i followed the instructions and even though my skin feels softer, no hair came up. the oil wipes also broke me out so i don't recommend it if you have sensitive skin (which i don't, but it still reacted.)
customer_reviews.author: paengxu

customer_reviews.title: Do not remove hair well, but do cause breakouts
customer_reviews.text: Used these for peach fuzz and eyebrows -- well, I TRIED too. These did not remove the hair well. I even warmed them up a bit with a hair dryer beforehand (it recommends warming them between your palms). They were painful and ineffective, and caused my otherwise clear skin to breakout afterward. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Came about half melted, and nasty
customer_reviews.text: These arrived and I didnt get to use them upon delivery, thinking nothing of it i put them on the shelf for a time when I would be ready for them, got them out 2 days ago, only to realize they look like a melted waxy mess that actually does not pull hair off very well and then when it did, it tried to pull skin as well....disappointed but like the idea of being able to have an easy use product at home..but save your money
customer_reviews.author: David & Rachel A

customer_reviews.title: I was a disbeliever...
customer_reviews.text: It's a MIRACLE! I was a disbeliever. I just placed it starting on nose, pressing upwards between brows, and ripped it off in opposite direction of hair growth. All hairs came off on the first try! Will reuse as indicated on package. OF course there is skin irritation, redness, some pain due to pulling the hairs, BUT NOT DUE TO THE PRODUCT. Anyone who has used waxing products before knows there is pain when you pull the wax off. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ana B.

customer_reviews.title: Got all of hubby unibrow first try!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a thick unibrow and is absolutely tortured when I pluck it. He requested I buy some wax strips instead. The last brand I bought I wasnt impressed. These though, wow! I only needed 1 strip for his unibrow and IT GOT IT ALL IN ONE RIP! Baby smooth! I was so impressed and he of course was really happy he didn't have to be "tortured". I put the unused strips in a plastic bag for the future when it regrows. If they dry up I will update this review- if not, then you will know I still love them!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use & works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to wax my upper lip. I have darker hair and as soon as it starts to grow back, I’d prefer to remove it. These were super easy to use and a great size strip for the upper lip. It got all of the hair off and left the waxed area a little red for about 20 minutes, then it disappeared. It came with a cloth to use after you wax that was soothing to my skin and got the little bit of excess wax off. I will definitely be buying again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing and works wonderful. Due to covid-19 I wasn't able to go to the salon for 2 months now, my upper lips was in mess so i decided to look for something to use. Read a few bad reviews and thought it wouldn't work, but decided to try it anyway. I'm glad I did because it works and all the hair is gone. Can't go wrong with the price either. Don't think i will need to go the salon anymore when i can do it myself... MUST TRY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shivanie

customer_reviews.title: Not buying again (NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN)
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use something quick and easy to remove my upper lip hair and came across this product. I don’t have sensitive skin and figured I would not get a reaction like some other customers. It took off the hair just fine but as soon as I took them off my skin was tingling and itchy. I figured it was normal and put the oil on right after. It’s been two days and I still have itchy red bumps on the areas I waxed. I do not recommend this product for sensitive skin. I don’t have sensitive skin and it gave me a reaction. Imagine if someone with sensitive skin uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Henao

customer_reviews.title: Not for Sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use, it also comes with a few oil wipes for removing any leftover wax. It wax out hair fine, not perfect, but good enough for home use. I am sensitive skin, and I have a few breakouts in the areas that was waxed, the allergic reactions wasn’t too bad, but too be safe I would only recommend it for normal skin, and not sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to handle and removes hair very well, but I don't think it should be used on sensitive skin or should not be applied more than once in the same place, as it can hurt the skin. But, it removes hair very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Silva

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Product is the waste of money does not remove any hair at all and I've tried several times with several strips and wasted my money and wasted all those ships trying to remove little hairs that should easily be removed by the product but it didn't work and I followed the directions exact a waste of money waste of
customer_reviews.author: Katiana Mirvil

customer_reviews.title: SO MANY BREAKOUTS
customer_reviews.text: My sister asked me to order these for her. I have always uses the sally Hansen ones. But I was like okay sure I’ll order them for you. Then I used one with her, for waking upper lip. OMG worst mistake ever!!!! Thank god we can’t leave the home because I literally look like a monster. The corners of my mouth completely broke out from this. I never had this happen to me before. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: Burn marks from waxing mustache
customer_reviews.text: Be careful! Looks like some people have used this for their mustache without problem but I used it and it hurt so bad and 2 days later, I still have red burn marks (embarrassing! So glad I don’t have to go to work!) and it is starting to scab now. Definitely won’t use again!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it thinking that it is a great hair remover. It is sensitive to the skin but does not pull the hairs thoroughly. The only reason I did not return it is I dont think it is worthy to waste trip to shipping center for that money. It does not stick to the skin properly, the size is also way smaller than anticipated. Will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Purna Kammar

customer_reviews.title: Pimples and rashes
customer_reviews.text: I would be hesitant to recommend. The strips only get soft hair like peach fuzz from mustache, but I had to wax it more than once to get all the hair and I don’t have much hair to begin with. I tried it on upper brow area and broke out in pimples. Threading and studio waxing don’t even break me out. I tried it on my boyfriend’s cheek and he had a RASH a few days later.
customer_reviews.author: Jahnel Walker

customer_reviews.title: DONT USE UNLESS YOU WANT RED MARKS ON YOUR FACE
customer_reviews.text: this first photo is TWO DAYS after using and the second is the following morning. It hurts so bad and am worried about it scarring. Please do not use these. I don’t even have sensitive skin. I’m not sure what in the world is in these to cause this massive wound on my face but it hurts so bad and was there for days. DO NOT USE THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked wonderfully and was easy. First time using a waxing product at home. Warmed the wax in my hands, unpeeled the strip and placed it along my jawline to grab those pesky little hairs I can't get to with tweezers. Held the skin taunt and pulled it off. Didn't hurt and my jawline is as smooth a baby's bottom. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Keon

customer_reviews.title: Fu Manchu
customer_reviews.text: First of all, wow!!! This is a terrible product! However, if you are lookin’ to remove everything but the white peach fuzz then by all means go ahead. This product works great for removing everything BUT hair! This is the worst picture I’ve ever seen of myself! It will heal but dang! How can this be ok?!?! It ripped my skin right off! Dryness is for sure guaranteed as now I have scabs. Again, I will heel and will be back to normal by next week hopefully with some help from triple antibiotic ointment! But in the meantime I have to walk around with this Fu Manchu! 🤪🥴 I’m shook!!! 😳
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have used this years ago and i still like it.
customer_reviews.text: Before I could afford to go to salons for my eyebrows and upper lip waxing, I used this and a few other brands. When stay at home orders were released, I wanted to keep them waxed still. I ordered this and It easy and fast. With in 5 minutes I'm done. I haven't experienced any "pain", or bleeding from this. I do have sensitive skin too.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Irritating to skin
customer_reviews.text: My teen daughter used these in the hopes of removing the hair above her lip. Unfortunately it didn’t work very well and only removed about half the hair. We kept having to put it on over and over again which ended up irritating her skin and causing her to break out. Don’t think we will be using this product again.
customer_reviews.author: coolbrz

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: I might just not know what I'm doing with these... but I followed all the instructions... I had good hair stubble for the wax to grab, but nope. nadda. not a single hair was pulled out. My skin certainly felt the effects - it was well "exfoliated" after trying the strips, and calmed down over night (no allergic reactions, no rash, etc). But, as for removing chin hairs - zero.
customer_reviews.author: T. Toburen

customer_reviews.title: You may never want to pay for professional waxing again!
customer_reviews.text: I love these wax strips— I order them in two sizes. I’ve tried several kinds and for me, these are simply the best. They are really easy to use and effectively remove hair on the first pass. Also included are calming oil wipes which remove any residual wax extremely well. I used to have my waxing done professionally but switched to these— such a savings, no appointment and great results!
customer_reviews.author: BK Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely Godsend! For someone who is very much dependent on a salon for hair removal I found myself in a bit of a tough spot with the current pandemic. When someone suggested these strips I was skeptical but after using it I think I can totally forgo the need for a paid professional! Works great and super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: GTS

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions exactly and was unable to produce any positive results. I tried these on multiple spots of my body with varying hair lengths with the same disappointing results. Do not waste your money on this. Go to a waxing place because these DO NOT WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Lawless Graphics

customer_reviews.title: I never leave reviews but this is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I usually use the wax that you need to melt in the microwave which ends up leaving a sticky mess. These strips are easy to use, just rub with your fingers,peel, and place on the skin. They remove your hairs from one try. The oil wipe that comes for after wax feels like the one they apply at the salons. Will never go back to any other brand
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: If you buy this, your wife might not leave you for another guy.
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these without any problems. Trust me if I bought her something she thought was not good she’d let me know. Actually she wouldn’t shut up about it if they didn’t work well, she would tell me how cheap I am and she wishes she would of married the guy from her work. Well if your reading this review “Brenda” just go be with “Richard” I don’t care......
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Does not pull out hair
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disheartened by this. It just don’t work on me. The problem is when I stick it on my upper lip hair and run my nails back and forth on the area just to ensure it sticks and pulls it out, very very few hairs gets pulled out. The wax just doesn’t hold the hair strong enough to uproot it.
customer_reviews.author: Hunnybunny

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it's okay
customer_reviews.text: So this was the first time trying waxing strips. Though they say you can use one strip again, it didn't work for me. It takes the bigger hairs, but definitely not all of them. I have PCOS so I used them on my chin and still have tons of larger thick hairs that they didn't pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! They Work!
customer_reviews.text: Early during the COVID-19 "Q" some of us couldn't languish at home working in designer pj's or atheleisure gear and had to make appearances in the office on a daily basis. yes, you health care workers, and first responders THANK YOU! And occasionally your mate would think you were going for some type of odd award for most facial hair grown in a month. This product enabled you to groom appropriately. They work. Ouch!
customer_reviews.author: Exospice

customer_reviews.title: Easy to peel your skin off
customer_reviews.text: So, I usually try not to be so harsh when I leave a review, but please, do not buy these. I followed the directions perfectly and I am no stranger to using wax, yet I am still missing little bits of skin from my face. Also the strips were very small. I wish they had provided larger sizes for areas like below my ears/jawline.
customer_reviews.author: Anna E G

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time waxing from home/ waxing myself. My normal waxer can't do anything under a mask-- so I let my lip grow a little too long during quarentine! I ordered this package and it came quickly, had easy to follow directions and worked like a charm. I just made sure to remove my makeup from the area and then I wiped it with alcohol to make sure there was no oil/moisturizer left. The results are beautiful. I'm so grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Art Teachering

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These strips are really easy to use and really get the hair off. I used them for my face 2x during quarantine when I couldn't get to the beauty salon. They work great, the only issue is they made me break out really bad both times I used them and I do not have sensitive skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: CatMom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great for facial waxing, mustache eyebrows, sideburns etc. The calming oil is very effective to soothe after the wax I recommend you use it. I have no issues with this product. I only thought the box would be a bit bigger but it’s tiny as shown in picture. Other than that I will buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: LEMOON&TEA

customer_reviews.title: Burned my face
customer_reviews.text: This left what looks and feels like like burns on my face. This picture was taken 9 hours after I used the product. There are bubbles on my skin like a burn. It did work well on my upper lip and wherever it worked, it burned my skin. I’m disappointed as my salon isn’t open yet. I wanted this to work
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Waste of money. Painful!
customer_reviews.text: I followed instructions carefully. NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN. Did not pull hair out but pulled skin off. Caused me to bleed. If you have sensitive skin do not even try these. I hate it i really needed this to work. Just thought I'd warn whoever cares to read reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Laylo

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I have never, every waxed at home. After reading reviews, I purchased, read directions. I have an eyebrow airbrush template that I cut the strips for my eyebrows to my shape. Rub between palms to warm up. I did my upper lip first. This is a no brainer; basically painless and TOTALLY AWESOME RESULTS!
customer_reviews.author: sandybb

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you use them properly.
customer_reviews.text: I have been waxing for years (in honesty the first year I was doing it wrong so I recommend everyone look up how to wax properly before trying any products). So long as you do it right they work great and are less painful than plucking and so much faster and safer than other methods.
customer_reviews.author: Verve

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it. It’s deff a very gentle wax strip. Compared to the sally Hansen was strips which in my opinion are very rough and can burn your skin, it’s the brand I was using before. This was my first time trying nads wax strips and will totally buy it again. I loved it. It didn’t leave behind any wax residue and no red marks.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Can cause a bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: Please be careful using this product. At first I was really impressed with using it the first time because it removed a lot of mustache hair with one time use. Then a half hour later my upper lip was red & swollen. It looked like someone hit me in the lip. I had to on and off ice pack it and the swelling lasted until the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: Misty D'Amours

customer_reviews.title: Useless product, doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely useless. I’ve tried three times now warming them between my hands and warming them with a blow dryer but they never get soft enough to actually pull out hair. I don’t think there’s enough wax in them To be of any use. I actually threw them away and I never throw things away. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: CMH

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product but just can't. I had chin hairs (a patch, I am told). I used these as directed and now have damaged skin patch where my skin is peeling from the use of this product. To say the least, I will not use it again.
customer_reviews.author: njoynaz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just used these on my lip for the first time about 10 minutes ago and was pleasantly surprised! It was very easy to use, and did a great job removing hair! I also appreciated that there was no left over wax on my face afterwards. I have very sensitive skin, so the area was red for a few minutes. The calming wipes they provided + ice helped a lot though. Overall, great product for $5!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Balcom

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works
customer_reviews.text: Almost pulled my whole face off. So clearly I have to give it five stars. Next time I won’t prep the area as well so some natural skin oil will keep a little more barrier. I Have no clue how others said it doesn’t work. But all in all, it was good. I put some lotion on it and went about my day newly hair free. I keep things moving and don’t fuss over much. I mean it’s not gonna be a 5 star spa treatment but you WILL be hair free (and partially skin free if you do it how I did).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Removed more skin than hair.
customer_reviews.text: Removed more skin than hair. Ouch! Does not effectively remove hair and the removal of skin left my face red, and scarred. After a few days the scab dried off. Terrible product and unsafe for me.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Wowza.
customer_reviews.text: I have never waxed anything before and I must say this product worked very well on most of my peach fuzz. There was an area that just refused to be waxed so I tweezed the area. I won’t blame the product for not being able to remove the deeply rooted fuzz. Overall I’m happy 😃
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S

customer_reviews.title: May work for you. Didn't for me.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews prior to purchasing. I thought these would work for me. But, nope they didn't. I followed the directions to a T. It didn't remove hair and left red marks on my face after use. I've had waxing treatments done in the past so, I know my skin will get alittle red. However the redness from these wax strips lasted alot longer. Pretty much a whole day. I personally wouldn't buy them again for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wax. Every time!
customer_reviews.text: This brand is awesome! The strips are far superior to the Sally Hansen wax strips. I use these for my upper lip and they work fabulous! I also have sensitive skin and these don’t make me break out. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Rice

customer_reviews.title: Can be used as a back during this pandemic situation
customer_reviews.text: This is a savior at this pandemic situation by removing the face hair , well it's easy to use .Not all the hairs comes out but by often pasting the sheet in the same area on the face by create some irritation so be careful . This removes all the tinny hairs quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Just plain didn’t work. Tried several time for light facial hair; made my skin red. Irritated, left all the hair behind anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Dana L. Meier

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I don’t see much difference between a non sensitive formula though. I still have small red spots & itchyness after using, which is normal for me when using a non sensitive brand. They did a good job at waxing. I used them on my eyebrows & upper lip.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Okay product.
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. They do work pretty good on bigger areas like the lip or middle of the eyebrow, but the smaller areas like under the eyebrow are not so easy. The strips are not super sticky and they can be a little hard to "warm up".
customer_reviews.author: Kelci C.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product a zero I would. This is apparently for sensitive skin but it nearly tore half of my upper lip now I have this giant bulge over my lip. I got this to avoid hot wax since I always get pimples from them but NEVER did hot wax rip my skin off the way this did. I’m in pain , my face is swollen, and this is by far the worst product I have ever used for waxing. Not only am I going to have pimples but my face feels 10x heavier due to it being swollen. This is NOT for sensitive skin, I repeat NOT for sensitive skin. I hope this helps someone
customer_reviews.author: Julissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these because my salon is closed due to covid19. Very easy to use, more important, effective! Wow! Used them on upper lip, eyebrows and chin. Includes soothing wipes to use after waxing. I’m hooked! Will be buying these forever!
customer_reviews.author: KimmyK

customer_reviews.title: Very poor product
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I give a poor review to any product after years at Amazon , but it was the worse experience after following instruction still causing pain in my upper lip.
customer_reviews.author: Yol Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Dont work
customer_reviews.text: I am not one to write a bad review... they just honestly didn't work. I have tried them multiple times over the past few days and just cant seem to figure out the problem... now my face has broken out all over my chin from these things. And I still have thick hairs all over. I threw the rest of the box away.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Decoteau

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these strips! They’re really easy to use and definitely take off the hair. The thinner hairs didn’t always come off, but that’s to be expected. Don’t go over the same area too many times or you will peel off your skin and scar.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get rid of all the hair + harsh
customer_reviews.text: Although it sticks to the skin, it doesn't get rid of most of upper lip hairs. It get rid of some of the hairs and i it's super frustrating. It ripped off my skin and left it super sensitive and red even the next day. Now it's brown... I will stick to threading, it's much less painful compared to this. Also why's are all the wax on the strips shaped like that? It not even a rectangle and a part of it got stuck to my nose. The oil tissues they gave with it made the burning worse, not soothing at all tf.
customer_reviews.author: thasmia s.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Other brands made my lip red, and get those weird bumps then they would turn to pimples. This pulls everything, that bump thing didn’t happen, and I don’t have to use as often. I’m purchasing more, saving money on waxing, and never using anything different. I use to have to wax every two weeks it’s been a bit longer than that... I still haven’t needed to re-wax yet.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not worth you time and effort
customer_reviews.text: The pack says 20 strips, however that means 10 strips of 2 strips each stuck together. The strips are too small and the wax content is even lesses. You can only use the strip for one pull. After that it even stops sticking and does not pull out anything. There is no drying powder given with this. it is just the strips and after wipe. It does not pull out hair efficiently. Overall very bad product. Deceptive advertising. Not worth paying 5$ for. It should not be charged for more 2$.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical about waxing my lip at home during quarantine but I needed to start feeling normal again. I always go to a professional but these are so easy to use and removed the hair perfectly. I like how you don’t have to hear up the wax and burn yourself. Would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Good for my mustache
customer_reviews.text: I have a bit of a mustache since having 2 kids and use these all the time. They are good at getting my mustache under control and keeping it at bay for a few weeks. It doesn't grab the 2 pesky coarse dark hairs that plague my life so I have to use tweezers for those. Overall, these are nice. They don't leave behind a lot of residue. They don't make my skin very pink afterwards, and they are really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: This product s good for all skin types. Mine s super sensitive, everytime i wax or thread skin turns super red. This product worked fine for me. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Just left the wax on my face. Was a sticky mess hard to wash off. Followed directions to the letter. They also don't tell you two strips come glued together, so you get ten sets, not 20 strips.
customer_reviews.author: writerkat

customer_reviews.title: Turn back now
customer_reviews.text: Ok 3 steps no problem. Yeah until you try them. If too cold they leave sticky goop on your lip. If too warm they remove no problem except they dont do the job. I have not waxed my lip in 4 years plenty of hair to remove. Saw the good reviews and was excited to use.Read instructions carefully, watched YouTube videos, cleansed area and used. Now I have a load of lip hair along with a red rash. During quarantine no salons are open and I break out with hot wax thought this product would be a miracle. DO NOT BUY, I am now plucking every hair by tweezers. Less redness and pain
customer_reviews.author: Dara West

customer_reviews.title: Not that great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I got these to remove some facial hair. It removed most of the hairs but made my skin very irritated. Couldn't bother using it for the rest of my face after the first 2 applications.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know until after I used it but it can take some skin off along with the hair lol. So this is a fair warning for those with sensitive skin. But I can say this can definitely remove hair and is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jgardner

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my light mustache lol. It works perfectly in removing it completely and all in one swipe. Just make sure that you go behind it with a bit of witch hazel, I use it to calm my skin afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: DaMoonChild

customer_reviews.title: Strip to wipe ratio is wrong - they should fix that
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine but there are 20 strips and 4 'soothing wipes' which doesn't make sense. And the wipes are enormous. There should be at least 10 wipes and they should be smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: This really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this and holy sh*t it works! These little things are strong and effective. I had low expectations at first but when I ripped the first strip off and saw how much hair was removed I was shook.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Moon

product_meta.title: Nad's Facial Wax Strips - Hypoallergenic All Skin Types - Facial Hair Removal For Women - At Home Waxing Kit with 20 Face Wax Strips + 4 Calming Oil Wipes
product_meta.description: Nad's Facial Wax Strips is a quick and easy way to remove unwanted facial hair from the upper lip, cheek, chin and middle brow. Made from natural beeswax, the facial wax strips use an innovative contour weave paper technology, which is softer and more flexible to conform to your facial curves. Nad's Facial Wax Strips remove hair as short as 2mm and leaves your skin hair free for weeks. Suitable for sensitive skin as the facial strips are hypoallergenic and fragrance free. With regular use, hair growth is progressively slowed down.
feature_bullets: The quick and easy way to remove unwanted facial hair
Ready to use, just rub, peel and go for results that last up to 4 weeks
Suitable for sensitive skin and delicate facial areas, strips are hypoallergenic and fragrance free
Perfect for upper lip, cheek, chin and middle brow
Innovative contour weave paper technology, strips are softer and flexible to conform to facial curves

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
